title: In-person Innovation: Michigan Tech Design Expo Emerges from Virtual Hibernation - Michigan Technological University
content: In-person Innovation: Michigan Tech Design Expo Emerges from Virtual Hibernation  Michigan Technological University
description: After two years of showcasing projects virtually, more than a thousand Michigan Technological University Huskies will stretch their legs (and their audienceâ€™s imaginations) as they present their incredible projects live on campus.
